long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin will hide the shorts videos from the Youtube interface. It will not change any other aspect of the user experience.
The user can still open the Short videos from direct access of the video's URL.

The Short videos will no longer be suggested to the user in the following places:
- in the home page
- in the search result page
- in the video's player page, in the right panel.
